#summary Conferences that are relevant to the Soar group at UM.

= Submission Deadline Calendar =

Year to year, conference submission deadlines remain relatively constant. The
table below lists typical conference deadlines by month.

|| *Month* || *Conferences* ||
|| *January* || [http://www.aaai.org/Conferences/AAAI/aaai10.php AAAI], [http://ijcai-11.iiia.csic.es/ IJCAI], [http://www.cs.mcgill.ca/~icml2009/ ICML], [http://www.sigevo.org/gecco-2010/ GECCO], [http://aigicrv.site.uottawa.ca/ CAI], [http://www.wcci2010.org/index.php WCCI] ||
|| *February* || [http://cognitivesciencesociety.org/conference2010/index.html CogSci], [http://sitemaker.umich.edu/icdl2010/home ICDL], [http://ecai2010.appia.pt/ ECAI], [http://www.iccbr.org/iccbr2010/iccbr2010.html ICCBR] ||
|| *March* || [http://www.cs.mcgill.ca/~uai2009/ UAI] ||
|| *April* || [http://iccm2010.cs.drexel.edu/ ICCM], [http://www.aiide2009.org/AIIDE2009/Welcome.html AIIDE], [http://www.ecmlpkdd2009.net/ ECML] ||
|| *May* || [http://www.ecal2009.org/ ECAL] ||
|| *June* || [http://nips.cc/ NIPS] ||
|| *July* || ||
|| *August* || ||

= Submission Deadlines =

These deadlines are official for a particular conference year:
  * [http://www.cse.yorku.ca/AAMAS2010/ AAMAS 2010] -- papers due October 13th, 2009
  * [http://www.kr.org/KR2010/ KR&R 2010] -- papers due November 30, 2009
  * [http://cbrtrack-flairs-23.info/ FLAIRS 2010] -- papers due November 23rd, 2009
  * [http://www.sigevo.org/gecco-2010/ GECCO 2010] -- papers due January 13th, 2010
  * [http://www.aisb.org.uk/convention/aisb10/AISB2010.html Human Memory for Artifical Agents] -- papers due January 15th, 2010
  * [http://www.wcci2010.org/index.php WCCI 2010] -- papers due January 31st, 2010
  * [http://sitemaker.umich.edu/icdl2010/home ICDL 2010] -- papers due February 20th, 2010
  * [http://ecai2010.appia.pt/ ECAI 2010] -- papers due February 22nd, 2010
  * [http://www.aaai.org/Conferences/AAAI/aaai10.php AAAI / IAAI 2010] -- papers due January 19th, 2010
